name: Challenger (AxonGameStudios, Manifest_M, l1ttl3_h0rse, nizygg, Yolo Jaurneg, SonSil, rerolf)
name_original: Challenger (AxonGameStudios, Manifest_M, l1ttl3_h0rse, nizygg, Yolo Jaurneg, SonSil, rerolf)
description:
The spaceship is in distress, the captain decides to wake the crew from suspended animation in order to save the cargo. Due to oxygen loss, a limited number of team members can be selected (min 1, max 7). During the game, you can replace team members, immersing some in suspended animation and awakening others. Until the ship crashes, a countdown timer works, events periodically occur that the player needs to react to in order to successfully complete. Two endings: a wreck or successful landing of a spaceship complete.


Authors:
Yulia Uvarova -  Game designer
Elizaveta Popkova - 2D artist
Svetlana Kaisina - 2D artist
Nikolay Telpuhovskiy - Level designer
Andrey Bogdanov - Programmer
Nikita Milovanov - Programmer
Maxim Samodurov - Programmer
